variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at Speed Step 1, range 0(default)-255
variable.comment: Range 0-255, 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration
variable.label: Start voltage
Volt di Partenza
variable.comment: Valori 0-255, 0 in CV2, CV5, CV6 produce accellerazione lineare
variable.tooltip: Progr. tensione motore a Velocità Step 1, valori 0(default)-255. Vedi anche CV56
Sets the acceleration rate (delay or momentum), 1(default)
variable.label: Accel 1 Rate
Grado Accell.1
variable.tooltip: Progr. grado accellerazione (ritardo o inerzia), valori 0(default)-255
Sets the deceleration rate (delay or momentum), 1(default)
variable.label: Decel 1 Rate
Grado Decell.1
variable.tooltip: Progr. grado decellerazione (ritardo o inerzia), valori 0-255
sets the motor voltage at top throttle Speed Setting, range 0(default)-255
variable.comment: Range 0-255, A value of 255 corresponds to 100%. 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration
variable.label: Maximum Voltage
Volt Massimi
Höchstgeschwindigkeit
variable.comment: Valori 0-255, Un valore di 255 corrisponde al 100%. 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produce curva accellerazione linea retta
variable.tooltip: Progr tensione motore alla massima velocità, valori 0(default)-255
sets the motor voltage at midrange throttle Speed Setting, range 0(default)-255

variable.label: Midpoint Voltage
Volts intermedi
Vmittel (0-255)
